title: Milestone Acceptance Criteria
description: Defines the acceptance criteria for a tycs milestone, used by Content CI and the learner progress system.

milestone.description: Milestone identifier matching the directory name (e.g., '01-kv-store').

name.description: Unique kebab-case identifier for this criterion (e.g., 'put-and-get').

order.description: Display order index. Criteria are shown to the learner in ascending order.

description.description: Human-readable description shown to the learner.

error_hint.description: Optional diagnostic hint shown when the criterion fails. Guides without revealing the answer.

type.description: The type of assertion to run against program output.

expected.description: The expected value. Interpretation depends on assertion type.

command_args.description: Optional CLI arguments passed to the learner's program for this specific test.
